org.joty.gui

Class NumberFormatter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.joty.gui.NumberFormatter

  • public class NumberFormatter
extends java.lang.Object
    It is a wrapper for a java.text.NumberFormat class that uses an internal WrappedField object to store some of the Joty datum components and to have them processed by its methods. The class uses the configuration data to set the java.text.NumberFormat and this is exposed my means of the render method.
